title: Graham Collier - Sequestering Carbon between crop rotations

tasks.task: Explain the process of Caranata crop and its benefits.
subtasks: Describe how Caranata harvests energy from the sun.
Explain the role of carbon dioxide in the Caranata process.
Describe the water source used by Caranata.
Explain how Caranata creates yield for biofuels and oil products.
Describe the carbon sequestration process in Caranata.
Explain the goal of using Caranata in non-food acres.
Highlight the net negative carbon impact of Caranata.
